column5: Alot of things changed for me in May. The restuarant has picked up with the warmer weather so work has had me tied down for the most part, the days im not working im usualy out fishing somewhere and any time inbetween consist of eat, sleep, and party. Also after a couple last steelie trips earlier in the month I have focused most of my fishing on warmer water species as its weird for me to fish for steelies when I can wear a t shirt and shorts out. I think its about time I give em a  break anyway and even out my longsleve tan I aquired while fishing in the spring sun with jackets on. I think my next priority is getting a hair cut  :grin:  now onto the pics!
nice month!  you must love that pin cause it looks like you use it for everything!
Haha I use my pins for any fishing that alows me to ie any float fishing or bottom bouncing. ever since ive used one ive always loved the feel of fight more than any other reel!
Some great photos.  This is my fav. NATURAL.     TFS
looks like some good fishing  what's a pin?.......
great way to welcome spring - those are some nice fish.
Great post! That's an awesome mix bag of fish to start the soft water season with. Good job! This post has moved the center pin combo up a few spots on my wish list!!
Great report, fish and pics l2p Thanks for sharing Leechman
Great pics man. Look forward to the next report.
You're obviously a young man with many talents, fishing and photography are clearly among them.
Thanks for the awesome feedback guys, the next report is already in the making.  Spiel, fishing and taking nice pics are just two things i love to do that go along well with each other!
Great pics!  I love the pose with the reel/rod over the shoulder, that killer!  That dock spot look like bass heaven!
Great report, love your style of fishing...stalking the banks with a pin and rod...WTG!
